settings.heading: Refund Policy
settings.content:
If you are not fully satisfied with your purchase, you may request a return within 15 days of delivery by completing the Return Form using your order number.

Returned items must be in their original condition, including tags and packaging. We do not accept returns for items that have been worn, used, washed, altered, or damaged.

Refunds are processed bi-weekly (between the 1st and 15th of each month) and issued to your original payment method. Please allow up to 10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement. Shipping costs and any related handling fees (e.g., duties) are non-refundable.

settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.content:
We offer complimentary shipping on all online orders, with delivery typically completed within 10 business days. You can anticipate a slight delay during August 2025.

Please note that you may be subject to additional import duties, taxes, or fees depending on your delivery destination. These charges are determined by local customs authorities and are not collected or controlled by our Online Store. While shipping is free, these additional costs may apply and are the responsibility of the customer.

If your estimated delivery date is not convenient, you may choose an alternative date within 5 business days. Where available, you can also select a specific time slot for delivery.

Our shipping partners include DHL, UPS, TNT, FedEx, Royal Mail, Chronopost, and Aramex.

settings.heading: Customer Care
settings.content: Reach out to our support team for any assistance at esonline@eliesaab.com.
